string.name: name
string.value: Receiving Power B. Fore's Certificate of Training Again
You lost the Certificate of Training that #p1012118# gave you. Without it, you won't be able to enter the Training Center. Go see #b#p1012118##k again.
You'll be able to receive the Certificate of Training from #p1012118# again by training. Hunt 200 #o1210101#s.\r\n\r\n#o1210101##r #a225201##k
You hunted the #o1210101#s. Hmm... You're not sure how much longer you'll be able to train here.
What is it? You want to receive my training again? Puhaha! My training is so great, even people who've completed training want to receive it again! Okay, let's start training!
Hunt #r200 #o1210101#s#k. Only difficult training can make you a master!
You refuse? revolting already? Now, now... You're not nearly strong enough to fight me. Hehe, why don't you cool your head and then come back.
Ah, you defeated 200 #o1210101#s? Faster than I thought. This is all a result of my training. Here, take this.
You must be very happy to receive the Certificate you so desired. Puhaha.
Have you not been able to defeat #r200 #o1210101#s#k yet? I seem to have trainees who are unable to keep up the intensity of my training, hehe.
